mapper.select: select genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID as internal_study_id, mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID as entrez_gene_id, mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START as position, COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START = #{position} THEN sample.PATIENT_ID END)) as mut from mutation INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = mutation.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN mutation_event ON mutation.MUTATION_EVENT_ID = mutation_event.MUTATION_EVENT_ID INNER JOIN sample ON sample.INTERNAL_ID = mutation.SAMPLE_ID INNER JOIN patient on sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID where mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID = #{entrez_gene_id} and genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID = #{internal_study_id} and genetic_profile.GENETIC_ALTERATION_TYPE = "MUTATION_EXTENDED" and mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START = #{position}

select genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID as internal_study_id, mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID as entrez_gene_id, mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE as mutation_type, COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE = #{type} THEN sample.PATIENT_ID END)) as mut from mutation INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = mutation.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN mutation_event ON mutation.MUTATION_EVENT_ID = mutation_event.MUTATION_EVENT_ID INNER JOIN sample ON sample.INTERNAL_ID = mutation.SAMPLE_ID INNER JOIN patient on sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID where mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID = #{entrez_gene_id} and genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID = #{internal_study_id} and genetic_profile.GENETIC_ALTERATION_TYPE = "MUTATION_EXTENDED" and mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE = #{type}

select genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID as internal_study_id, mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID as entrez_gene_id, mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START as position, mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE as mutation_type, COUNT(DISTINCT (CASE WHEN mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE = #{type} and mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START = #{position} THEN sample.PATIENT_ID END)) as mut from mutation INNER JOIN genetic_profile ON genetic_profile.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID = mutation.GENETIC_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN mutation_event ON mutation.MUTATION_EVENT_ID = mutation_event.MUTATION_EVENT_ID INNER JOIN sample ON sample.INTERNAL_ID = mutation.SAMPLE_ID INNER JOIN patient on sample.PATIENT_ID = patient.INTERNAL_ID where mutation.ENTREZ_GENE_ID = #{entrez_gene_id} and genetic_profile.CANCER_STUDY_ID = #{internal_study_id} and genetic_profile.GENETIC_ALTERATION_TYPE = "MUTATION_EXTENDED" and mutation_event.MUTATION_TYPE = #{type} and mutation_event.ONCOTATOR_PROTEIN_POS_START = #{position}
